Econometrics and Free Software PhD Candidate at BÉTA, University of Strasbourg and Research Assistant at STATEC, Luxembourg

Welcome to my page. If you are were one of my students, you’re probably interested in the Teachings (if links are dead, don’t hesitate to send me an email!) and Software pages. If you’re a fellow PhD candidate, maybe my Research will be of interest to you. If you want to email me, you can click on the red envelope at the top-right corner of any page. You can also follow me on twitter. I sometimes write blog posts about R, and hope to contribute in this way to R-bloggers.
